duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform analysis of operations, workflows, and production processes to provide solutions to maximize efficiency and reduce waste.
Assist with developing and implementing process improvements and technology upgrades to minimize costs and production issues at various sites globally.
Provide Major Capital Support and technical leadership in conceptual and detailed design to Global Facilities Delivery on major capital projects.
Support the Design Delivery Gate Review process and participate in Manufacturability Review assessments.
Provide ongoing technical support to site plant engineering groups, domestic and global, as well as technical mentoring to engineering teams.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Industrial Engineering or related field, and 5 years of experience in manufacturing or related.
